channel.title: Infinity arms, Dragon med Helm [NEED TUT]
channel.description:
i downloaded a old server because they better then all the new PK servers! (who agrees?)
and i know its a old tut that probley been deleted for the tutorial page but, how do i fix the ifinity top so you cant see your arms popping throught the top and Dragon Med helm so you cant see your helm[br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 07:22:43 PM[/size][hr]can anyone send me link for it or anything or post the tut here? Come on anyone!!![br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 07:26:19 PM[/size][hr]comon anyone ill make u admin on my server 0.0
